/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, acting as the main artery of the city, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is taken from the left side of the street, looking towards the right side, offering a comprehensive view of the city's daily life.
